description:
Entry-Level Business Analyst sought by TX based IT co. w/t Master of Economics or equivalent to manage company's annual plan, quarterly forecasts & variance analysis; Provide Ad hoc analysis; execute special business projects using Oracle financials and provide audit (ASAT/SOX) support; Work with SMSs to ensure systems req. coordinate with MIS to ensure finance resources; train finance users on system procedures.

WK 40 hrs, Mon-Fri - 9a-6p, comp. Sal.

1200 Walnut Lane #1100,
Irving, TX 75038.
